subject: Item SSN1801
description_text: Hello has this item been sent as of yet ?

conversations.body_text: ​  Hi, your order has been dispatched but I noticed that the logistics have not been updated, we are investigating your parcel for you, sorry for the inconvenience.

Hello thank you for getting back to me hope to hear from you soon

On Wed, 25 June 2025, 8:18 pm service@simsonn.com,
Hi Christopher Augerinos,     Here's a link to your logistics tracking, it's been updated and is expected to arrive around the 4th. https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045784692578
